message: I'm feeling generous, Bob.  Let's split it 90/10.  Take it or leave it!
Alice, that's not a great start! Let's be reasonable. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  Take it before inflation eats away at our potential gains!
Okay, Bob, let's be fair.  I'll take 60% this time, and we can call it even.  Time is money, so let's wrap this up!
